movies.title: Drumul oaselor
movies.plot: Margelatu, the feared criminal helps the Romanian resistance to fight the dictatorial authorities.
movies.simplePlot: Margelatu, the feared criminal helps the Romanian resistance to fight the dictatorial authorities.

biography.bio: His family left Cluj when it was ceded to Hungary in 1940, and moved to Cernauti after the city's occupation by Romania the following year. There, his father was appointed to the role of chief municipal veterinary. Later they returned home, and Florin graduated from the High School for Boys No. 3 in Cluj. Piersic attended the Caragiale Academy of Theatrical Arts and Cinematography in Bucharest. He joined the regular cast of the Romanian National Theater at 1959 and performed in numerous productions until his retirement in 1989. His first role was as Richard in The Devil's Disciple. In 1958 he made his debut on screen in the French-Romanian co-production The Thistles of the Baragan. He appeared in more than forty movies, most of them in the Ceausescu era. He often depicted heroic, masculine characters. More recently, he played in a soap opera. Piersic married thrice: to Tatiana Iekel (their marriage lasted from 1962 to 1974), with whom he had a son, Florin Jr.; To Anna Szeles (1975-1985), the mother of another son, Daniel; and from 1993, he is married to Anna Torok. Im 2006, he was voted to the 51st place on the 100 greatest Romanians list. At 2008 he became an honorary citizen of Oradea. In 2009, he was bestowed with the lifetime achievement award in the Transilvania International Film Festival.
biography.name: Florin Piersic

biography.bio: Marga Barbu was born on February 24, 1929 in Ocna Sugatag, Maramures, Romania. She was an actress, known for Drumul oaselor (1982), Haiducii lui Saptecai (1971) and Haiducii (1966). She was married to Eugen Barbu. She died on March 31, 2009 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Marga Barbu

biography.bio: Ion Marinescu was born on November 22, 1930 in Craiova, Romania. He was an actor, known for Drumul oaselor (1982), Gioconda fara surîs (1968) and Vlad Tepes (1979). He died on September 20, 1998 in Bucuresti, Romania.
biography.name: Ion Marinescu

biography.placeOfBirth: Vadul Rosu, Soroca county, Romania [now Republic of Moldova]
biography.bio: Iurie Darie was born on March 14, 1929 in Vadul Rosu, Soroca county, Romania. He was an actor, known for Rautaciosul adolescent (1969), Dragoste la zero grade (1964) and B.D. in alert (1971). He was married to Anca Pandrea. He died on November 9, 2012 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Iurie Darie

biography.bio: Remus Margineanu was born on March 22, 1938 in Cugir, Romania. He is an actor, known for Undeva în Est (1991), Matei copil miner (2013) and Loverboy (2011).
biography.name: Remus Margineanu

biography.bio: Ernest Maftei was born on March 6, 1920 in Bacau, Bacau, Romania. He was an actor, known for The Punishment (1976), Vlad Tepes (1979) and Dumbrava minunata (1981). He died on October 19, 2006 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Ernest Maftei

biography.bio: Toma Dimitriu was born on April 27, 1908 in Tamaoani, Frumusita, Galati, Romania. He was an actor, known for Mitrea Cocor (1953), Stephen the Great - Vaslui 1475 (1975) and Tudor (1963). He died on April 27, 1984 in Romania.
biography.name: Toma Dimitriu

biography.bio: Petre Gheorghiu-Dolj is an actor, known for Vlad Tepes (1980), Drumul oaselor (1982) and Vlad Tepes (1979).
biography.name: Petre Gheorghiu-Dolj

biography.bio: Adrian Stefanescu is known for his work on Drumul oaselor (1982), Un comisar acuzã (1974) and Mercenaries' Trap (1981).
biography.name: Adrian Stefanescu

biography.bio: Ion Besoiu was born on March 11, 1931 in Sibiu, Sibiu, Romania. He was an actor, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Bucharest Non Stop (2015) and Toate pînzele sus (1976). He died on January 18, 2017 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Ion Besoiu

biography.bio: Constantin Dinulescu was born on March 19, 1933 in Alexandria, Romania. He is an actor, known for Train of Life (1998), A unsprezecea porunca (1991) and Misterele Bucurestilor (1983).
biography.name: Constantin Dinulescu

biography.bio: Vasile Constantinescu is an actor, known for Drumul oaselor (1982), Canarul si viscolul (1970) and Return from Hell (1983).
biography.name: Vasile Constantinescu

biography.bio: Emil Coseru is an actor, known for Drumul oaselor (1982), Trandafirul galben (1982) and Masca de argint (1985).
biography.name: Emil Coseru

biography.bio: Traian Stanescu was born on March 27, 1940 in Faget, Romania. He is an actor, known for Probleme personale (1981), Misterele Bucurestilor (1983) and Trandafirul galben (1982).
biography.name: Traian Stanescu

biography.bio: Ovidiu Schumacher was born on July 26, 1942 in Moreni, Romania. He is an actor, known for That Trip We Took with Dad (2016), Felix si Otilia (1972) and Le coq décapité (2007).
biography.name: Ovidiu Schumacher
